document.full_text: two of the federal reserve's most powerful officials said on monday the u.s. central bank should stick to its super-easy monetary policy, arguing inflation is not a threat and unemployment remains too high.
document.title: fed to stick with low rates, despite oil price rise
lines_and_colors: two of the federal reserve's most powerful officials said on monday the u.s. central bank should stick to its super-easy monetary policy, arguing inflation is not a threat and unemployment remains too high.
